title: Spicy meatloaf
ingredients: ['550g minced beef or pork, or a mixture', '6 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon tomato ketchup', '1 tablespoon brown sauce', '1 teaspoon mixed dried herbs', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons creme fraiche', 'salt and pepper to taste']
